pauseApp

public void pauseApp()
Deallocate the player and the display thread. Some VM's may stop players and threads on their own, but for consistent user experience, it's a good idea to explicitely stop and start resources such as player and threads.

startApp

public void startApp()
If the player was playing when the MIDlet was paused, then the player will be restarted here.
